input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Script Name Necklace"
Reference Product Description:
Names are beautiful and unique. Make sure you don't miss this special Modern Script Name Necklace and wear yours with style!

16 inch is perfect for a Child or someone on the shorter side.
18 Inches is the most popular size for most woman.
20 inches for anyone who is tall or likes to wear their chain on the longer side
Nameplate can measure up to 1.75 inches wide depending on name length.
Available in Sterling Silver, 14k Gold & Gold Plated

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='925 Sterling Silver Personalized Nameplate Pendant Necklace'
  - Name='Zales Script Name Necklace and Initial Stud Earrings Set'
  - Name='Zales Petite Script Name Necklace and Initial Stud Earrings Set'
  - Name='Personalized Name Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Engraved Name Necklace'
  - Name='14K Solid Gold Personalized Name Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Love Gold Name Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Cursive Nameplate Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Cursive Name Necklace for Women'
  - Name='Cursive Name Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Gold Name Pendant Necklace'
  - Name='Personalized Script Letters Name Necklace with Cuban Chain'
  - Name='PicturesOnGold.com Custom Name Necklace For Women Personalized Name Necklace in Sterling Silver or Gold Necklace Personalized with any Name or Word'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 925 Sterling Silver Personalized Nameplate Pendant Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product matches the key features of the reference: personalized nameplate, pendant necklace, and sterling silver material, indicating very high similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Script Name Necklace and Initial Stud Earrings Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes a script name necklace similar to the reference, although bundled with earrings, slightly broadening the product type but still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Petite Script Name Necklace and Initial Stud Earrings Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to reference in script name necklace aspect, though 'petite' indicates a smaller size and the inclusion of earrings adds variation, slightly reducing relevancy.
General personalized name necklace matching the core concept, though lacking specifics on script style or materials similar to the reference.
Personalized name necklace but with engraving focus which may differ from the modern script cut-out style; still relevant as a name necklace.
Nearly identical in function and materials (14K gold) to the reference's 14K gold option with personalization, indicating very high relevancy.
Includes 'love' in the product name which may imply a style or theme different than purely name-focused script necklaces; still a personalized name necklace so moderately relevant.
Exactly matches key attributes: personalized, cursive (modern script-like) style, nameplate necklaceâ€”fully aligned with the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Cursive Name Necklace for Women
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches the reference in scripted cursive style, personalization, necklace type, and target demographic, making it highly relevant.
Matches scripted style and necklace type but lacks explicit personalization term; still very relevant given name necklaces usually imply personalization.
Features personalized gold name pendant necklace, aligning well with reference's material options and personalized name focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Personalized Script Letters Name Necklace with Cuban Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Script letters necklace aligns well with reference's modern script name necklace; inclusion of Cuban chain may imply different chain style but product remains highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PicturesOnGold.com Custom Name Necklace For Women Personalized Name Necklace in Sterling Silver or Gold Necklace Personalized with any Name or Word
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An identical product from the same brand with matching features and options, making it fully relevant (identical).
